name: Tensor Flow, Machine Learning Study Jam

venue.name: Imaginarium Nigeria
venue.address_1: Plot 18 elegushi beach road, 3rd roundabout, epe expressway, Lekki Phase 1, Eti-Osa 101245, Lekki

description:
We are looking forward to seeing you at the TensorFlow Dev Summit recap / Machine Learning Study Jam session event!

We invite you to join us in exploring machine learning together.

• What we'll do
Come join us to learn more about one of the most geeky, interesting, and most hyped topics today: deep learning networks. We'll conduct a Machine Learning Study Jam going through some great content.
We'll provide snacks and drinks and we'll also raffle some swag.

• What to bring
Your laptop (to participate in the study jam)

• Important to know
Have fun and learn!

Sponsored by our friends at Google Developers Group community, GDG helps developers connect, network, learn and grow a functional dev community in Lekki-Ajah, Lagos and the World at large.
how_to_find_us: Plot 18 is along the elegushi beach road after Nike Art Gallery and WakaNow. Its a cream colour Upstairs building with a black gate.

name: Google I/O Extended  ' 18 Ajah

venue.name: Imaginarium Nigeria
venue.address_1: Plot 18 elegushi beach road, 3rd roundabout, epe expressway, Lekki Phase 1, Eti-Osa 101245, Lekki

description:
Google I/O is an annual developer conference held by Google that brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at Google’s latest developer products. This year’s developer festival will be held May 8-10 at the Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View, CA and we are extremely excited to announce that GOOGLE I/O EXTENDED will happen in Ajah, Nigeria.

Since we'd like you to get the full experience of the I/O three-day outdoor tech festival as if you were there, we are pleased to invite you on June 2 at 2:00 PM @ Imaginarium creatives, Plot 18 Oba Elegushi road, after Nike art Gallery, Lekki phase 1, Lagos, Nigeria. Where we'll livestream the I/O event and also host several interesting sessions for you. The event features experiential learning, Google’s latest developer products, and talks from Google Product Managers & Engineers — plus a few surprises along the way

You can't afford to miss out on this year's I/O. Looking forward to meeting you guys!
how_to_find_us: Plot 18 is along the elegushi beach road after Nike Art Gallery and WakaNow. Its a cream color one story building with a black gate. call 0902 720 4568 or 08039688395 for further information

name: Flutter Study Jam

venue.name: Imaginarium Nigeria
venue.address_1: Plot 18 elegushi beach road, 3rd roundabout, epe expressway, Lekki Phase 1, Eti-Osa 101245, Lekki

description:
Flutter Study Jams is a Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn Flutter in person and support them to complete the course. Everyone, who completes the course will get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

WHO TO ATTEND?
Flutter Study Jam is suited best for: 1) those just getting started with mobile app development 2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks.

WHAT TO BRING?
Bring along yourLaptop systems or Mobile devices to complete the Udacity Flutter "Building scalable applications with Flutter" course.

Build Actions for Your community
how_to_find_us: Imaginarium Nigeria is on the same street as Legacy place, Nike Art Gallery and Wakanow. After highlighting at Ikate 3rd round-about after lekki, take a bike going to Plot 18, you can also walkdown to Plot 18.

name: Google Cloud Next '18 Extended - Ajah

venue.name: Imaginarium Nigeria
venue.address_1: Plot 18 elegushi beach road, 3rd roundabout, epe expressway, Lekki Phase 1, Eti-Osa 101245, Lekki

description:
Join us for this year's Google Cloud Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year, we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC
1. Kubernetes and ML training Lab using Qwiklabs.
2. Google Cloud Certification
3. Speaker sessions with Cloud Technology experts

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (a $55+ value)!

Don't forget to bring a laptop (PC, Mac, or Chromebook), and get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event, and fill up the registration form embedded in the link below.
https://goo.gl/forms/imhAYcEExiFIhvt23

name: DevFest 2018 Ajah

venue.name: 1 Folashade Awe St, Lekki Phase I, Lagos
venue.address_1: No 1 folashade Awe street beside Golbek security, off new creation road, Maruwa bus stop, lekki

description:
DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs and more! We are excited to bring the DevFest energy to GDG Ajah this Year! We would be showcasing multiple speaker sessions across Google products areas such as:

Actions on Google: Building smart AoG chatbots using DialogFlow.

Android - What's new with Kotlin and Flutter 2.0 Widgets.

Google Cloud - Kurbernetes, App Engine as well as Firebase.

Introduction to IoT using Android things.

Machine learning with Tensorflow.

Attendees coming in for DevFest18 Ajah should kindly refer to GDG event code of conduct: https://support.google.com/developergroups/answer/3340512?hl=en&ref_topic=3340510

Build actions for Google.
how_to_find_us: No 1 folashade Awe street beside Golbek security, off new creation road, Maruwa bus stop, Lekki, Lagos.

name: Android Cell Approach
description: The Android Cell Approach is a Study group that is bent on creating a community of resourceful mobile experts that build, contribute and collaborate to create impact in the Mobile app development space with Technologies such as Kotlin, Flutter, Native Java and more. To learn more about this Study group click here ---> https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1mmjCppCEXHCjFofL6lWerHX6vz-N-h3v5p08JAg-0NM/edit?usp=sharing

name: Android Cell Approach
description: The Android Cell Approach is a Study group that is bent on creating a community of resourceful mobile experts that build, contribute and collaborate to create impact in the Mobile app development space with Technologies such as Kotlin, Flutter, Native Java and more. The series of work sessions are beginner friendly - that would enable mobile app development enthusiasts level up their skills using emerging technologies. Seasoned developers are not left out as well. To learn more or contribute to this Study group, do DM the organizers.

name: Tensorflow Dev Summit 2019' Extended

venue.name: Imaginarium Nigeria
venue.address_1: Plot 18 elegushi beach road, 3rd roundabout, epe expressway, Lekki Phase 1, Eti-Osa 101245, Lekki

description:
We are excited to join Machine learning practitioners from all round the globe in getting firsthand information concerning updates , product announcement and new release to the widely used ML framework that is TensorFlow.

TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for two days of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

We are hosting a viewing party as well as Tensorflow.js talks and hands-on involving Google Colab around TensorFlow at GDG AJah come 23 of March 2018.

Catch you all there!

#TFDevSummit
